txt.en: 'Morflak is good to his friends. Just don't cross him, and you'll be fine. Keep it up, [placeholder]!'
'This is much better than the slop we usually get! Those who serve Morflak well are always rewarded! You did very well, little [placeholder].'
Raiding the Larder
'This is much better than the slop we usually get! Those who serve Morflak well are always rewarded! You did very well, little [placeholder].'
'Morflak is good to his friends. Just don't cross him, and you'll be fine. Keep it up, [placeholder]!'
You have been seen and the food taken
'Ah, the good stuff! This is much better than the usual slop we Uruk-hai get here.'
Delivered the food to Morflak
'Ah, the good stuff! This is much better than the usual slop we Uruk-hai get here.'
You have been seen and the food taken

The largest larder is within the guard-house, atop a short stair within the southernmost point of the ring-wall, right by the entrance to Isengard.\n\nMorflak's lackey wants you to get some of the good food from the guard-house and to bring it to Morflak, north-west of the southern entrance and south-west of Orthanc.
Delivered the food to Morflak
You have delivered the food to Morflak and should speak with him.
Morflak's lackey is very pleased about your delivery of the food to Morflak.

The largest larder is within the guard-house, atop a short stair within the southernmost point of the ring-wall, right by the entrance to Isengard.\n\nMorflak's lackey wants you to get some of the good food from the guard-house and to bring it to Morflak, north-west of the southern entrance and south-west of Orthanc.
'Where are you going with that?'
You have delivered the food to Morflak and should speak with him.
'Where do you think you're going with that?'
Morflak's lackey is very pleased about your delivery of the food to Morflak.
'What do you think you're doing with that?'
'Hey! What are you doing?'
'Oy! What are you up to?'
'Oy! You there! What are you doing with that?'
'Is that the good stuff? Who said you could take that?'
Find the guard-house by the southern gate and pick up some good food
Carry the food to Morflak without being seen by the gate-keepers
Talk to Morflak

Carry the food to Morflak without being seen by the gate-keepers
Find the guard-house by the southern gate and pick up some good food
Gate-house
Talk to Morflak
Talk to Morflak's lackey
Isengard
Morflak's lackey has told you that the best food is saved for the guards at the gate, but Morflak wants some of it.

'There are larders in the buildings that line the Ring, and that's where the good food is kept. The largest one is within the guard-house, right by the entrance at the southern-most point of the ring. A set of steps lead to the door. You've seen the slop they feed us here. The good stuff is saved for the guards at the gate!

'Well, Morflak wants some of the good stuff, and if you get it for him, he's bound to share some of it with the ones he can trust. That's me, and if you do this well, maybe it's you too.

'So go to the larder and grab some of the good food -- don't let the gate-keepers see you with it -- and bring it back to Morflak!'
